Echoes of the Opera or Der Wildschutz
Langwith, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £12 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £5, 4th £2.10s. March contest - 1st Hasland, 2nd Peasley Colliery. 4th annual contest 7 bands competed.
